title: SPP-R310 - 3 inch (USB / Wifi / Bluetooth / Serial)
summary: A Truly Compact Design3 inch ThermalmPOS-ible Mobile Printer∙ WiFi printer∙ iPad mobile printer, iPhone portable printer, iOS mobile receipt printer (MFi certified)∙ Android mobile printer∙ Linerless label printer (optional)∙ Bluetooth/WiFi printer-Warranty - 1 Year
specs: Product Description DetailsUsed for∙ Customer receipt∙ Work order∙ Direct Store Delivery note∙ Tax collection∙ Line busting∙ Table side ordering∙ Taxi / Train fare receipt∙ Shelf labels∙ Instant price tag label∙ Parking citation / Traffic violation ticket∙ Evidence labelsSmaller and Lighter Design- It supports easy to grip with 30% lighter and 26% slimmer than SPP-R300- One touch cover open and easy paper loadingMobile Field-Work OptimizationWireless and wire connectivity options includingBluetooth, WiFi, USB and Serial.- Embedded NFC tag enabling simple Auto-Bluetooth pairing- Apple® MFi certified model (Auto-switchable from iOS mode to standard Bluetooth mode)- IP54 rated rugged design (with protective case)- 1.8 m drop resistant- Low-temp (-15°C) and high-temp (up to 50°C) printing with an integrated temperature sensor- Long-lasting battery life(24-hour stand by time)Built for Multi-Purpose- Fast printing speed of up to 100 mm/sec (receipt)- Designed for thepurpose receipt and labelprinting (easy to switch through feed button)
